combinationSkills.name: Pound
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. P.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension-unlocked Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Can be Units of same character.

combinationSkills.name: Ancient Bond
combinationSkills.description: [Foes] Non-Elem. P.Attack activates aft. S.A Combos by 2+ Ascension upgraded(x3+) Units w/same Comb. Attack. ※ Cannot be Units of same character.

combatSkills.name: Fiery Protector

combatSkills.name: Jolts
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Fast Lo Fire P.Attack & Str., Mag. and Agi.-30%/2 turns

combatSkills.name: Pure Casting
combatSkills.description: [Foes] Super Fire P.Attack w/Ultra Unguard Rate & P.Resist and Fire Resist-25%/2 turns

combatSkills.name: Vortex of Flames
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Hi Fire P.Attack w/temp Str. Boost & [Allies] Status Buff+1 turn

passiveSkills.name: Will of Fire
passiveSkills.description: When countering and attacking, regular P.Attack a Foe with Fire Element.
